choices.text:
in python make a plot that compares two columns in a dataframe.
import pandas as pd 
df = read_csv('data.csv') #read the csv file into df 

#create subplots for each column of interest and combine them with gridplot() function:  
gridplot(subplots=range(2), nrows=(len(list(filter(lambda x:(x['column1'])==True,df)))/3+1),ncols=3) 
plt.title('Comparison between Column 1 & 2') #add title to the plot
